INCARTI

Manufacture for Autonomy.

A network of makers to buy from
A network of buyers to make for

All built around blueprints (and they're all yours).

A network of makers to buy from,
A network of buyers to make for,




Incarti's challenge is to provide a route out of centralised commerce.
The world is best built by you and those you know, therefore we've provided a network so you can get your community making the stuff you really need.

We treat autonomy as a trackable metric, the point where what you consume is made from those you know.
